title: Mega-Mailbag
itunes:title: Mega-Mailbag
description:
A room filled with some heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal, & Colleen Wolfe – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL including Christian Kirksey inking an extension with the Browns, Andrew Hawkins signing with the Patriots, and Chip Kelly working with ESPN. The heroes then answer all of your Twitter questions in the Mega-Mailbag segment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
